subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The U.C.L.A. freshman Patrick Cantlay made the field for his first United States Open, three former Open champions came up short and Vijay Singh did not even try Monday.
snippet: The U.C.L.A. freshman Patrick Cantlay made the field for his first United States Open, three former Open champions came up short and Vijay Singh did not even try Monday.
